LECM FIR MADRID FIR - LECB FIR BARCELONA FIR

    LEAN-B8526/25
    DU: 07 11 2025 08:02 AU: PERM
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) REF ENR 6.1-1 (WEF 15-MAY-25)
    AMA MINIMUM SECTORS INCREASE THE FOLLOWING SECTORS:

    AMA ID: 28.0/-15.5
    - WHERE IT SAYS: 8400 FT
    - IT MUST SAY: 8600 FT

    AMA ID: 28.0/-16.0
    - WHERE IT SAYS: 8500 FT
    - IT MUST SAY: 8600 FT

    AMA ID: 27.5/-16.0
    - WHERE IT SAYS: 8500 FT
    - IT MUST SAY: 8600 FT

    AMA ID: 27.5/-15.5
    - WHERE IT SAYS: 8500 FT
    - IT MUST SAY: 8600 FT

    SEE 'HTTPS://INSIGNIA.ENAIRE.ES/?LOCALE=EN(AMPERSAND)TYPE=ENROUTE'

    LEAN-B8778/25
    DU: 13 11 2025 15:51 AU: 16 02 2026 23:00 EST
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) IN ACCORDANCE WITH COUNCIL DECISION (CFSP) 2021/908 , PERMISSION
    TO LAND IN, TAKE-OFF FROM OR OVERFLY THE TERRITORY OF SPAIN SHALL
    BE DENIED TO ANY AIRCRAFT OPERATED BY BELARUSIAN AIR CARRIERS,
    INCLUDING AS A MARKETING CARRIER IN CODE-SHARING OR BLOCKED-SPACE
    ARRANGEMENTS.

    PREVIOUS PARAGRAPH SHALL NOT APPLY IN THE CASE OF AN EMERGENCY
    LANDING OR AN EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT. SPANISH AUTHORITIES MAY
    DETERMINE NOT APPLICABILITY OF THE PARAGRAPH ABOVE WHEN A
    LANDING, TAKE-OFF OR OVERFLIGHT IS REQUIRED FOR HUMANITARIAN
    PURPOSES OR ANY OTHER PURPOSES.

    LEAN-B8780/25
    DU: 13 11 2025 15:54 AU: 16 02 2026 23:00 EST
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION:

    ALL AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED
    BY CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING
    AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
    AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY SPANISH
    AIRSPACE EXCEPT HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY
    RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE SPANISH
    AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY
    OVERFLIGHT. REQUESTS FOR HUMANITARIAN FLIGHTS SHALL BE SENT TO
    THE CONCERNED SPANISH AIRPORT OPERATOR.

    LEAN-B0766/26
    DU: 30 01 2026 13:24 AU: 16 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) UNTIL FEBRUARY 16, 2026, SPANISH CIVIL AIR OPERATORS ARE STRONGLY
    ADVISED NOT TO CONDUCT ANY FLIGHT IN THE AIRSPACE WITHIN THE
    MAIQUETIA FIR (SVZM), DUE TO THE POTENTIAL RISK TO CIVIL AVIATION
    FROM INCREASED MILITARY ACTIVITY, ANTI-AIRCRAFT WEAPONS CAPABLE AT
    ALL ALTITUDES, AND LACK OF COORDINATION BETWEEN THE PARTIES TO THE
    CONFLICT.

    EMERGENCY SITUATION: IN AN EMERGENCY THAT REQUIRES AN IMMEDIATE
    DECISION AND ACTION FOR THE SAFETY OF THE FLIGHT, THE PILOT IN
    COMMAND MAY DEVIATE FROM THIS NOTAM TO THE EXTENT NECESSARY TO
    ADDRESS THAT EMERGENCY.

    LEAN-B0768/26
    DU: 30 01 2026 13:29 AU: 16 02 2026 23:59
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) UNTIL 16 FEB 2026 2359 UTC, SPANISH CIVIL AIR OPERATORS ARE
    RECOMMENDED TO EXERCISE CAUTION AND IMPLEMENT CONTINGENCY
    PLANNING WHEN OPERATING AND ROUTING WITHIN:
    A) SAN JUAN FIR (TJZS),
    B) CURACAO FIR (TNCF),
    C) PIARCO FIR (TTZP) WEST OF 0570000W,
    DUE TO POTENTIAL SPILLOVER RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH THE
    DEPLOYMENT AND POSSIBLE USE OF MILITARY ASSETS IN THE REGION.
    THIS ADVISORY COMPLEMENTS THE SPANISH NOTAM IN FORCE FOR
    MAIQUETIA FIR (SVZM) UNTIL 16 FEB 2026

    -NIAMEY FIR/KANO FIR/N'DJAMENA FIR/BRAZZAVILLE FIR
    -STATUS: ACCEPTED/OUTBOUND ONLY
    -REMARK:INCLUDE CR2 IN THE FPL AS PER THE CONTINGENCY PROCEDURE IN
    KHARTOUM AIRSPACE OVER SOUTH SUDAN ABOVE FL245.
    17.HKJK-KJFK
    APKUB UQ293 EKMOG NN UW325 BUN UG862 DIR BERTI SIHAR TISIR BRF SOVAL
    BAMBA N726 ORTOP SONAP KOMUT LENSI 4130N 4340N 4450N/N0477F430 JAROM
    LO MPI TUSKY PLYM PARCH4

    FIR WILL BE AGREED TACTICALLY DURING FPL APPROVAL BY THE ALGIERS ATS
    UNIT.

    LITED DIAP

    HLLL-A0016/26
    DU: 20 01 2026 00:00 AU: 16 04 2026 23:59
    A) HLLL
    Q) HLLL / QARCS / IV / NBO / E / 195/660 / 2800N01754E999
    E) TEMPO ALTERNATIVE RTE ESTABLISHED FOR FLIGHTS TRANSITING TRIPOLI
    FIR BTN CAIRO AND N'DJAMENA FIR AS FOLLOWS:
    1. TFC FM HECC TO FTTT:
    DITAR 265903N0250000E DCT LAGSI 252145N0194418E DCT DEKTU
    220000N0122806E.
    2. TFC FM FTTT TO HECC:
    DEKTU 220000N0122806E DCT LAGSI 252145N0194418E DCT DITAR
    265903N0250000E
    NOTE-MANDATORY ATS COM PROCEDURES:
    1. FOR RTE SEGMENT BTN DITAR AND LAGSI CONTACT KUFRA TWR ON FREQ
    121.9 MHZ.
    2. FOR RTE SEGMENT BTN LAGSI AND DEKTU CONTACT SEBHA APP/TWR ON FREQ
    119.1 MHZ.
    THESE PROCEDURES APPLY TO ALL TFC USING THIS RTE IN BOTH DIRECTIONS.
    CONTACT SHALL BE INITIATED NOT LESS THAN 10 MINUTES PRIOR TO ENTERING
    EACH RTE SEGMENT.
    ADDITIONALLY IN ACCORDANCE WITH AIC A02/24 APPLICABLE TO DESERT AREAS
    IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT A LISTENING WATCH BE MAINTAINED ON THE
    DESIGNATED IN-FLIGHT BROADCAST PROCEDURE (IFBP) FREQ 126.9 MHZ 10
    MINUTES BEFORE ENTERING TRIPOLI FIR UNTIL LEAVING THE AIRSPACE.
    THIS FREQ IS FOR BROADCAST PURPOSES AND IS IN ADDITION TO MANDATORY
    ATS COM

    FRI      0600-0630(PPR), 0730-1800, 2030-2100(PPR), 2215-2245(PPR)
    SAT      0001-0030(PPR), 0900-1800, 2040-2135(PPR)
    SUN      0600-0630(PPR), 0900-1530, 1615-1800, 2040-2135(PPR)
    ATS AVBL DURING ABOVE AD OPR HOURS ONLY. NO ARR OR DEP LATER THAN
    CLOSING TIMES MINUS 15 MINS. INBOUND ACFT ARE REQUIRED TO ALLOW
    SUFFICIENT TIME TO RECEIVE AN ATS AFTER AD REOPENING. SAR OPS OCCUR
    H24, THEREFORE PILOTS TRANSITING THROUGH OR WI THE VICINITY OF THE
    ATZ OUTSIDE OF THE AD OPR HOURS ARE RECOMMENDED TO MAKE BLIND CALLS
    ON THE HUMBERSIDE TOWER CHANNEL 124.905MHZ. USE OF THE AD DURING PPR
    PERIODS IS BY PRIOR ARRANGEMENT THROUGH A HANDLING AGENT OR WITH
    TERMINAL SUPERVISOR ON 07718 524072.

LFBB FIR BORDEAUX

    LFFA-R2358/25
    DU: 28 10 2025 00:00 AU: 27 04 2026 23:59
    A) LFBB
    Q) LFBB / QROLP / IV / NBO / W / 000/036 / 4544N00217E008
    E) ZONE INTERDITE TEMPORAIRE (ZIT) 'LA COURTINE' - LUTTE ANTI DRONE :
    1. LIMITES LATERALES :
    IDENTIQUES A LA LF-R203A LA COURTINE PUBLIEE A L'AIP ENR 5.1.
    2. STATUT :
    ZONE INTERDITE TEMPORAIRE QUI COEXISTE AVEC LES PORTIONS DES ESPACES
    AERIENS AVEC LESQUELLES ELLE INTERFERE.
    3. CONDITIONS DE PENETRATION :
    - PENETRATION INTERDITE A TOUT AERONEF SANS EQUIPAGE A BORD,
    A L'EXCEPTION DES AERONEFS SANS EQUIPAGE A BORD EFFECTUANT DES
    ACTIVITES MILITAIRES, DE DOUANES, DE POLICE, DE RECHERCHE ET SAUVETAGE, DE LUTTE CONTRE L'INCENDIE, DU TRANSPORT MEDICAL AYANT A INTERVENIR DANS LE CADRE DE L'EXECUTION DE LEURS MISSIONS ET LORSQUE CELLES-CI NE PERMETTENT PAS LE CONTOURNEMENT DE LA ZONE.
    - DEROGATION SOUMISE A L'ACCORD DE L'AUTORITE GESTIONNAIRE AVEC
    UN PREAVIS DE 30 JOURS.
    4. SERVICES RENDUS :
    LES SERVICES RENDUS SONT CONFORMES A LA CLASSE DES PORTIONS DES
    ESPACES AERIENS AVEC LESQUELLES LA ZIT COEXISTE.
    5. ORGANISME A CONTACTER :
    - GROUPEMENT DE CAMP DE LA COURTINE - OFFICIER D'ASTREINTE
    - TEL : 06 08 56 46 89 OU 06 08 56 46 92.
    F) SFC
    G) 500FT AGL

    DU: 31 01 2026 16:00 AU: 24 02 2026 16:00
    A) LFMM
    Q) LFMM / QROLP / IV / NBO / W / 000/021 / 4322N00459E003
    E) CREATION D'UNE ZONE INTERDITE TEMPORAIRE (ZIT) SUR LA COMMUNE DE
    'MARTIGUES' :
    1-LIMITES LATERALES :
    CERCLE DE RAYON 1.5NM CENTRE SUR PSN 432212N 0045924E.
    2-LIMITES VERTICALES :
    DE LA SURFACE (SOL OU MER) A 2100FT (630M) AMSL.
    3-STATUT :
    LA ZIT SE SUBSTITUE AUX PARTIES D'ESPACES AERIENS NON CONTROLES AVEC LESQUELLES ELLE INTERFERE ET COEXISTE AVEC LES PARTIES D'ESPACES AERIENS CONTROLES AVEC LESQUELLES ELLE INTERFERE.
    4-CONDITIONS DE PENETRATION :
    PENETRATION INTERDITE A L'EXCEPTION DES AERONEFS :
    - AU DEPART OU A DESTINATION DE L'AERODROME 'ISTRES LE TUBE' AYANT UNE CLAIRANCE DE L'ORGANISME DU CONTROLE D'ISTRES
    - EFFECTUANT DES ACTIVITES MILITAIRES, DE DOUANE, DE POLICE, DE RECHERCHE ET SAUVETAGE, DE LUTTE CONTRE LES INCENDIES OU DU TRANSPORT MEDICAL, AYANT A INTERVENIR DANS LE CADRE DE L'EXECUTION DE LEURS MISSIONS ET LORSQUE CELLES-CI NE PERMETTENT PAS LE CONTOURNEMENT DE LA ZONE
    - AYANT OBTENU UNE AUTORISATION DE LA PREFECTURE MARITIME DE TOULON
    - AYANT OBTENU UNE AUTORISATION AVEC UN PREAVIS MINIMUM DE 48HR AUPRES DE 'CECMED' : TEL 04 22 42 25 59.
    5-SERVICES RENDUS :
    - DANS LES PARTIES DE ZIT COEXISTANT AVEC DES PORTIONS D'ESPACE AERIEN CONTROLE, LES ORGANISMES DU CONTROLE HABITUELS RENDENT LES SERVICES DE LA CIRCULATION AERIENNE CONFORMEMENT A LA CLASSE D'ESPACE DES PORTIONS DES ESPACES AERIENS CONTROLES PRECITES.
    - DANS LES PARTIES DE ZIT SE SUBSTITUANT A DES PORTIONS D'ESPACE AERIEN NON CONTROLE ET DE ZONES REGLEMENTEES, LES ORGANISMES HABITUELS RENDENT LES SERVICES DE L'INFORMATION DE VOL ET D'ALERTE.
    F) SFC
    G) 2100FT AMSL

    THE ACTIVATION/DEACTIVATION OF THESE AREAS WILL BE CARRIED OUT

    (OPERATIVE AIR TRAFFIC SQUADRON) OR APP IN EACH AREA.

          UNIT APPROPIATE PROCEDURE, IF DEACTIVATION IS NOT FEASIBLE
          BEFORE ENTERING THE AREA.

     RMK: ANY FLT INTERESTED IN USING AFFECTED AIRSPACE MUST CONTACT
          WITH TALAVERA APP/TWR IN ORDER TO UPDATE ACTIVATION STATUS.

LFMM FIR MARSEILLE - LFFF FIR PARIS FIR - LFRR FIR BREST - LFEE FIR REIMS - LFBB FIR BORDEAUX

    LFFA-F1613/25
    DU: 10 11 2025 09:20 AU: 10 02 2026 23:59
    A) LFMM LFFF LFRR LFEE LFBB
    Q) LFXX / QXXXX / I / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4412N00042E455
    E) RESTRICTIONS RUSSIE ET BIELORUSSIE :
    1- IL EST INTERDIT A TOUT AERONEF EXPLOITE PAR DES TRANSPORTEURS AERIENS RUSSES, Y COMPRIS EN TANT QUE TRANSPORTEUR CONTRACTUEL DANS LE CADRE D'ACCORDS DE PARTAGE DE CODES OU DE RESERVATION DE CAPACITE, A TOUT AERONEF IMMATRICULE EN RUSSIE, A TOUT AERONEF NON IMMATRICULE EN RUSSIE QUI EST DETENU, AFFRETE OU CONTROLE D'UNE AUTRE MANIERE PAR UNE PERSONNE PHYSIQUE OU MORALE, UNE ENTITE OU UN ORGANISME RUSSE, D'ENTRER, DE QUITTER OU DE SURVOLER L'ESPACE AERIEN SOUVERAIN FRANCAIS, SAUF EN CAS D'ATTERRISAGE OU DE SURVOL D'URGENCE ET SAUF POUR LES VOLS TITULAIRES D'UNE AUTORISATION DEROGATOIRE DELIVREE PAR LES AUTORITEES FRANCAISES CONFORMEMENT AUX DISPOSITIONS EUROPENNES APPLICABLES
    2- IL EST INTERDIT A TOUT AERONEF EXPLOITE PAR DES TRANSPORTEURS AERIENS BIELORUSSES, Y COMPRIS EN TANT QUE TRANSPORTEUR CONTRACTUEL DANS LE CADRE D'ACCORDS DE PARTAGE DE CODES OU DE RESERVATION DE CAPACITE, D'ENTRER, DE QUITTER OU DE SURVOLER L'ESPACE AERIEN SOUVERAIN FRANCAIS SAUF EN CAS D'URGENCE ET SAUF POUR LES VOLS TITULAIRES D'UNE AUTORISATION DEROGATOIRE DELIVREE PAR LES AUTORITES FRANCAISES CONFORMEMENT AUX DISPOSITIONS EUROPENNES APPLICABLES
    3- IL EST INTERDIT DE PARTICIPER SCIEMMENT ET VOLONTAIREMENT A DES ACTIVITES AYANT POUR OBJET OU POUR EFFET DE CONTOURNER LES PRESENTES INTERDICTIONS.

    E) AVGAS FUEL SUPPLY AT VARIOUS AP SUSPECTED TO BE CONTAMINATED WITH
    PUMP-GAS OR ANOTHER SUBSTANCE. PILOTS ARE ADZ TO BE VIGILANT AND IF
    FUEL SUPPLY IS SUSPECT (LOOK AND SMELL), PILOTS ARE TO DRAIN SUCH
